sentences.sContent: Certifications which have been revoked may only be reinstated by full examination and recertification per Section 6.0 of this written practice.
sentences.sContent_eng: Certifications which have been revoked may only be reinstated by full examination and recertification per Section 6.0 of this written practice.
sentences.sCn: 被取消的认证，必须重新通过本书面实施细则第6.0条规定的全部考试之后，才可恢复认证。

sentences.sContent: If the gray box with the arrow is not displayed on the certification track you earned, the recertification requirement for this track is currently not available or no longer available.
sentences.sContent_eng: If the gray box with the arrow is not displayed on the certification track you earned, the recertification requirement for this track is currently not available or no longer available.
sentences.sCn: 如果在您获得的认证旁没有显示带箭头的灰格子，即是表明该重新认证目前没有新的要求或者要求已经不复存在。
